Hello world, I'm Nick 👋

I’m a product designer and front-end developer who obsesses over the little details so you don’t have to. I focus on intuitive user experiences that actually work, not just look pretty. With a user-first mindset, strong design fundamentals, an (un)healthy obsession with CSS, and a love for learning more JavaScript, I'd like to think that anything is possible.

Next steps? Check out my case studies and repositories, or contact me.
